thread.title: Shirley Armes
thread.title_full: Avas Flowers reviewed by Shirley Armes

author: Shirley Armes
title: Shirley Armes
text: From placing my order all the way to delivery Avas flowers has been exceptional! I've ordered from Avas flowers many times and I can always rest assured that my order will be beautiful. They stay in touch with me throughout the delivery and I know my order is handled as if we're me making the arrangements.
